divs: Sighting Detailsi was getting the kids loaded up to go pick the wife up from work, when i looked at the sky....the first clear sky in days so when i looked up i seen a few lights shooting across the sky and aftr the last one went by i noticed a very dim one way up there and i just got chills after that i noticed that the light almost disappeared when i jumped a quarter of the way across the sky and did this all the way till it was right above to when all of a sudden it was instantly like a couple miles above town and no sound what so ever and then it was gone....bam just like that, and i rean the house and jumped online to the satilite tracker and the only two above my area were 2 hrs prior to this event and ive seen this same ufo in kalispell montana as well almost identicl circumstances so ya dont know what else to say other than it was the coolest dam thing ive ever seen and there have been many sightings in this area above the fort peck soiux reservation just nobody reports anything, and i was so dumbfoundd i never even thought to go get the camera i was just froze in awe but ya hope to get another for y
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
trends: There has been one other sighting in Poplar
There were no other sightings in Poplar on or around July 9th 2010
Summary: Kinda like a trapezoid no lights but a few and made no sound whatsoever.
